mapper.update: update rentcar set company=#{company},type=#{type},price=#{price},name=#{name},filename=#{filename}, filesize=#{filesize},contents=#{contents}, renthp1=#{renthp1},renthp2=#{renthp2}, renthp3=#{renthp3},renttel=#{renttel},pickupplace=#{pickupplace},coordinates=#{coordinates} where id=#{id}
